ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 572
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I saw a star ruby plat veil for 750pp last night from an enchanter who was selling stuff really cheap.  So I guess it s all in who you talk to.  And being
ygData.messageBody:
> I was able to trade 2 black pearls for my choker. For
> a while, around lvl 10 or so, I ran around SK, Rathe
> Mountains, and EK, auctioning "buying black pearls". I
> would buy them at the site of the kill, and sell them
> for 100pp apiece to jewelers I knew.

I saw a star ruby plat veil for 750pp last night from
an enchanter who was selling stuff really cheap. So
I guess it's all in who you talk to. And being at the
right place at the right time. Must be the new influx
of L34 enchanters trying to undercut the traditional
prices. Some of these people selling plat jewellery
I had never heard of before.

Harmonic.
